description:
On its own or as part of your layering system, this fleece has a versatile comfort that will keep it creeping onto your packing list. Made from a light airgrid fleece, the Abisko ½ zip is wicking and warm, making it just as useful on multiday trips, as it is on chilly morning trail runs.

  • Recycled polyester fleece is warm, light, and quick drying
  • High collar keeps chilly winds off your neck
  • Thumb holes keep your sleeves from riding up and the back of your hands warm
  • ½ zip is great for adjusting ventilation on the fly
  • Panelled construction moves with you
  • Regular fit wears like you want it to
name: Fjallraven Abisko Lite Fleece Half Zip - Men's
